title: Secret Princess
description: The uprising at Kingsbury Prep has separated the Academy into different factions. The last time I chose sides, I nearly died. This time, if I survive, there's no turning back.  The odds are looking bleak, but somehow out of the darkness, there is hope in the form that no one saw coming...  ***Secret Princess is book 4 of the Bad Boy Royals of Kingsbury Prep Series. This is a High School New Adult Bully Romance with Reverse Harem and is more appropriate for 17 and up. There is dirty language, hot sex scenes, and violence.
author: Rachel Angel
